Description:
IN - 312134197 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health and safety of your employees in that (where you have been unable to avoid confined space entry) you have not ensured safe access and egress to the confined spaces ie the mash tun, coppers and fermenting vessels, is provided by a means which renders the work safe and without risks to health.

IN - 312134202 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health and safety of your employees in that you have not prepared suitable and sufficient arrangements with respect of confined space entry, specifically to the mash tun, coppers and fermentation vessels during cleaning operations, for the rescue of persons in the event of an emergency.
